record1.<1>:
declare subroutine OIPI_Report, RList
declare function rlist

retval = ''
report = ''
stmt = ''
done = ''
key = ''
win_name = CtrlEntId[1,'.']

x = Get_Property(win_name:'.RB_P2_ITEM','DEFPROP')

if x = 3 then
	/*
	stmt = 'SELECT ORDERS BY CUST_NO'
	Rlist(stmt,5,'','','')

	loop until done = 'YES'
		readnext key else done = 'YES'
			retval<-1> = key
	repeat
	swap @FM with @VM in retval
	*/
	
	report = get_property(win_name:'.RB_P1_ITEM','DEFPROP')
	if report = 1 then report = 'CUSTOMER'
	if report = 2 then report = 'PRODUCT'
	if report = 3 then report = 'DATE'

end else
	retval = @USER0
	report = @USER1
end

OIPI_Report(report,retval)

RETURN 0
